Data Fields
Vps_DctrlOutputInfo Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display Controller API

Structure containing output information. This structure is used to set output in the output node. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_VENC_OUTPUT ioctl. More...

#include <vps_displayCtrlDataTypes.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 vencId
 
UInt32 dataFormat
 
UInt32 dvoFormat
 
UInt32 aFmt

UInt32 hsPolarity
 
UInt32 actVidPolarity
 
UInt32 pixelClkPolarity
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing output information. This structure is used to set output in the output node. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_VENC_OUTPUT ioctl.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::actVidPolarity

Polarity for the active video signal for the digital output only valid values see Vps_DctrlSignalPolarity

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::aFmt

Analog output. See Vps_DctrlAnalogFmt for the possible Values

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::dataFormat

Output Data format from Venc. Currently, valid values are FVID2_DF_RGB24_888, FVID2_DF_YUV422I_YUYV.

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::dvoFormat

digital output. See Vps_DctrlDigitalFmt for the possible Values

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::fidPolarity

Polarity for the field id signal for the digital output only valid values see Vps_DctrlSignalPolarity TODO - Check if this is possible in DSS.

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::hsPolarity

Polarity for the horizontal sync signal for the digital output only valid values see Vps_DctrlSignalPolarity

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::pixelClkPolarity

for valid values TODO 0x0: Data is driven on the LCD data lines on the rising edge of the pixel clock. 0x1: Data is driven on the LCD data lines on the falling edge of the pixel clock.

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::vencId

Node Number of the Venc

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::videoIfWidth

[IN] Video interface mode. For valid values see Fvid2_VideoIfWidth.

UInt32 Vps_DctrlOutputInfo::vsPolarity

Polarity for the vertical sync signal for the digital output only valid values see Vps_DctrlSignalPolarity
